Santa_Ana.Roger Rabbit's Car Toon Spin: Roger Rabbit's Car Toon Spin is a dark ride located at the Disneyland Park (Disneyland Resort) and Tokyo Disneyland theme parks. It is inspired by the 1988 Walt Disney Pictures/Touchstone Pictures and Amblin Entertainment feature film Who Framed Roger Rabbit. Both versions of the attraction are located in Mickey's Toontown.
